page.title: 10Glassworks in a castle cont.
page.content: The two men we spoke started this cottage industry because by starting their own business they are able to do some work and make a living. One of the really clever things that they did was to make coloured paper weights.They put the rods of colour in the glass while it is still hot and they can make it look as if there are flowers or crystals in side a solid piece of glass.Glass can be made into the same size and shape by blowing into a mould. When the glass is still quite hot it is rolled and cut or allowed to bend to make additional shapes. The men told us that they do not make their own glass but reheat broken glass. When they are working they sit on their chairs and all they wear is a vest and a pair of shorts. It is very hot and you need a lot of puff.
